name: The Legend Of Zelmore
description:
Welcome to Zelmore! The zelda-like Gumball fangame where you play a young hero and need to defeat the evil Rob!

You need to play it on a emulator and i left a lot of bugs in to make it really feel like the trashy old NES game you bought in the gamestore for a dollar.

controls:

customizable, but if you use the standard setup:

z: attack

x: speak with NPC

arrow keys: move

goal: 

find a witch in the southern hills that can help you get one step closer to uncovering the location of Rob.. and when you find him.. run to the end as fast as possible where you can destroy his palace! (i know it is weird)

lore:

You are a young hero whose people fled away after a great chaos a few decades ago. It is told that only a descendant of the great hero who helped your people escape can defeat the evil lord of darkness Rob.. And now is the time for you to strike, after months of staring at maps and reading countless books you found out only a few people survived. People that already hid when the the evil Rob entered our realm, hidden in the mountains and on the country side so they could survive any disaster.  It is time to save the lands.. to bring a fall to the palace, and reign, of the evil Rob!

how to download:

dubble click zelmore.zip, dubble click zelmore folder, dubble click mesen.exe, select unpack everything, click unpack and enter the new zelmore folder, click mesen.exe, you will need to setup your input, click file, click open, go to the zelmore folder, click game.nes and play!

Thanks to:

NESmaker: tools and music

Wes O.: main playtesting
